snippet: Members of the bipartisan group of senators known as the Gang of Eight say the best they can do is offer ideas for the negotiations between President Obama and Speaker John A. Boehner.
abstract: Members of the bipartisan group of senators known as the Gang of Eight say the best they can do is offer ideas for the deficit reduction negotiations between Pres Obama and House Speaker John A Boehner.
lead_paragraph: Members of the bipartisan group of senators known as the Gang of Eight say the best they can do is offer ideas for the negotiations between President Obama and Speaker John A. Boehner.

headline.seo: ‘Gang of Eight’ Says Deficit Solution Should Come From the Top
headline.main: Senate ‘Gang of 8’ Says This Isn’t Its Moment in Deficit Talks
headline.print_headline: Senate ‘Gang of 8’ Says This Isn’t Its Moment in Deficit Talks
